name: Element NFT Marketplace
highlight: An all-in-one multi-chain NFT marketplace with lowest trading fee, powerful trading utilities and intelligent&instant data service.
summary: Element Market, the all-in-one multi-chain NFT marketplace, provides users with high liquidity lowest transition fee, powerful trading utilities, and intelligent&instant data services. It provides a one-stop service from creating, discovering to exchanging NFTs, with more than 130,000 community users. Element now has aggregated 140million+NFTs from Ethereum, Polygon, BNB Chain, and Avalanche Chain.
